name: Nature Simulator 2014 Pre-Alpha Prototype V 3.04
description:
Enter the World of a Beautiful Graphical Forest, Containing Waterfalls, The Sounds of Mother Nature and You.

This Game was Made by Nicolas Pagliocco (Age 13)

This is a Demo, Which this is not Finished All the Way, I am Soon Hoping to Make more

Minimum Requirements:

RAM:2 Gb or Higher

Hard Drive:164 MB or Higher Depending of Space for the Game

GPU:Geforce GT 730 Or Higher

CPU:Intel/AMD (1.9 GHZ Or Higher)

Minimum Resolution of 800x600

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Update Log #4

-Added Motion Blur + Bloom For the Camera

-Updated the Grass (Just a Test, Dont Hate because its Bad. i Tried.)

-Added a Pause Menu

-Fixed the Water Being in the Grass

-Fixed a Bug with the Menu By not Letting you move your Mouse

-Bumped up the Shading Quality to High instead of Low

Glitches, Concerns or Ideas, Message me by Email at nickypag@gmail.com

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
